data.name: Girls In Tech Summit
data.description: The Girls in Tech Summit is a celebration of TechGirlz’s 10th Anniversary with talks on technology given by girls, for girls. TechGirlz was founded in 2010 and offers free, fun, interactive “TechShopz” led by industry professionals, leaders and students. The TechGirlz mission is to inspire middl

relatedRecords.name: GDG DevFest Modesto & Berkeley
relatedRecords.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…

relatedRecords.name: Midwest Dreamin' 2019
relatedRecords.description: Midwest Dreamin’ is a conference organized by the Salesforce Community. Join this super user group meeting to learn and meet people in your community.

relatedRecords.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.
